website_summaries.verdict: Italian made, this beechwood rack is easy to assemble and stores folded flat.
pros: Made in Italy from natural beechwood
Pasta doesn't stick to the arms
cons: Dowels holding the pasta are spaced too close together
Some felt the rack as a whole doesn't hold enough pasta

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pasta Drying Rack made in Italy
customer_reviews.text: Great pasta drying rack. Goes together nicely and breaks down quickly for storage. I was able to dry approximately one pound of Fettuccini perfect for a family. I had no problems with pasta sticking to the drying arms.
customer_reviews.author: KarpeTech

customer_reviews.title: Stores away flat
customer_reviews.text: So easy to dry my spaghetti on. I love that it folds down flat. I think I will buy a couple more since I make many lbs of pasta at a time.
customer_reviews.author: YOPORO

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We have just started making our own past and this is great for drying out the spaghetti when we make it.
customer_reviews.author: Starr (Fetter) Mullins

customer_reviews.title: “Legs“ didn’t extend properly
customer_reviews.text: The materiel is very nice but it was almost impossible to extend the part of the product at the bottom to make it steady. The “legs” seem to have been maybe partially glued so that I felt like they were going to snap when I tried to extend them so I couldn’t fully do so. I was able to extend them enough to make it stable and use it but I worry the next time I use it it may snap when I try to open it. I bought this one because I like that it could fold open and closed easily but that doesn’t appear to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Bcobbs

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used it to hang my fettuccini as I finished cutting the batch of pasta dough. "Sturdy" for what it is; did not wobble on the countertop. Unfolds for use, then stores back flat easily, so minimal storage space needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for fresh pasta making!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer rack has come in handy more than once! I enjoy fresh pasta but usually make too much... the rack holds the extra pasta until I'm able to get to it. There is no assembly, and it's fairly stable, once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Can make the macaroni sooner and it tas
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful I can do my noodles and hang them out on this dryer to dry instead of laying them on paper towel or on the sheet they dry in no time and I can make dinner without having to wait for them to come out of the refrigerator make sure they're dry it's so much easier and so much faster
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Sloat

customer_reviews.title: Study and easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: Started making pasta during quarantine...didn’t realize it would stick to every single thing it touched! This thing is awesome. Plenty of space for pasta, sturdy, and easy to store with the fact it folds down flat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hardt Hüs

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I make homemade noodles all the time. Saves cleaning trays I used to put it on. .
customer_reviews.author: Tashia

customer_reviews.title: Can't see how this could be better
customer_reviews.text: A cleverly designed device for holding your freshly made pasta. It does what its designed to do extremely well. Its well built and easy to store when folded up for storage. It earned its five star thank you from this pasta lover.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Works like promised.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for it's ease of use. There are only two parts: the base and the top rack. Both pieces are made of good quality wood and the base "feet" fold inward. This makes it flat and easy to store. Because the "feet" fold inward, both pieces can be stored and take up no more storage space than a 1 1/2" thick book. This is of great importance to me because space in my kitchen is at an all time premium price. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie 777

customer_reviews.title: Fit for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Fit the purpose. Rather stable even when all the pasta is hanging on it. However the height is a bit limited, if it was a couple of inches caller will be better allowing more flexibility when hanging tagliatelle or spaghetti to dry I like the fact that it occupies very limited space when folded up. However it doesnt look very sturdy, I wonder how long it will last by continuous pulling it open and close
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The rack it easy to set up, wipes clean and storages flat! Love it thou if you make a lot of pasta I recommend two.
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: Folds away for easy storage
customer_reviews.text: This pasta drying rack is a beautiful and useful addition to my kitchen. It is easy to use and stores just as easily thanks to the way its parts fold to make it flat.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool to have
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is described and It works for me. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBestFriend

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great product & made in Italy. Don’t buy the cheap plastic one made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This stand does exactly what is advertised and is very easy to use. 'Nuff said! Now go make some pasta!
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Nice design/easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: One rung is slightly warped but of course its wood... so... what can you do. Not the fault of the manufacturer. Nice design and easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Westerdahl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pasta dryer. Takes up very little storage space.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pasta dryer and have used it many times. It works very well. It holds a lot of Pasta, and is tall enough that you can dry fairly long noodles with it. It easily cleans up, and I love how it folds up so small for storage. It easily slides into the side of a cupboard and takes up very little room. It is very sturdy and I very much enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The dowels can’t be removed
customer_reviews.text: Slightly upset that the wooden dowels are glued in, would prefer if they were removable. Otherwise good product!
customer_reviews.author: Casey H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest functional pasta dryer
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Personally, I like having a little more space between rods as I have big hands... or removable rods so that they are easier to let out, but this is the cheapest GOOD pasta dryer on the market, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect I use it weekly Makes drying the pasts easy
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rocanello

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to put up when not using.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, some people complains its not tall enough. Maybe if your wanting the lady and the tramp yard long pasta, this is not for you. Great for standard length pasta drying, like that its collapsable since my kitchen is small and space is not what i have a lot of.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph King

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for drying noodles, light weight, easy to store, great value. The dowels will fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rack as it folds for storage. It works great for my pasta making adventures. I wish it was a bit higher, but I managed to put a block under each end so I can dry longer noodles! Good quality beechwood
customer_reviews.author: crimmps49

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time when I make spaghetti or egg noodles. This rack is large enough to hold a batch of spaghetti or egg noodles. It has always been sturdy and has never fallen over on me and I also like the fact that it folds up flat for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lieske

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently got into making pasta for the family and needed a drying rack. The one she showed me was more circular and freestanding (not collapsible). I surprised her with this one for X-mas and she loves it. It easily folds up and tucks under the counter, sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought two.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much that I bought a second one! My favorite thing about this rack is that it folds flat and stores so easily. I don't like to crowd the fresh pasta and two racks are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well & is very useful
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes apart easy to store it and it is super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, very simple
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, very simple, put very sturdy! I had a lot of fun using it with my pasta making class on Craftsy :). I almost feel like I know how to cook, hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this, it is very well built and came in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This rack is perfect size for novice pasta makers. Pasta doesnt stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and simple to use. Fold it up and put it away when you're done with it. Sturdy in design and stays put when you're draping pasta on it. I wish it made the pasta for me!
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but seems to be well made, and nice for what it is. Now I have to get busy and make some noodles!
customer_reviews.author: Eyes wide openTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps to dry the pasta well. Also keeps it from tangling.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Souza

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery for a grandson that is obsessed with pasta making. Great size for the kitchen space, easy fold up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Does What Its Supposed to Do!
customer_reviews.text: For drying pasta it works just fine. Like the fact that it folds up for storage and doesn't take much room in the pantry. Good value too!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Functions perfectly and stores nicely
customer_reviews.text: That pretty much sums it up. It works 100% as expected. It's not rock science...unfold, hang pasta, let dry, take pasta off, fold drying rack up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Batts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy fold down storage
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to use, its nice that this can be stored folded down. A must for making homemade pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Amrae206

customer_reviews.title: Compact, and decent for price
customer_reviews.text: easy to store, worked as advertised, well made for the price, held pasta well, was scared to break it the first time I unfolded legs however.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bevington

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this pasta rack. There are many different styles. This one is so easy to use and it stores flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I turned the rack around so that the long past could hang over the edge of the counter. I weighted the base with my recipe book
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Folds down flat quickly and holds a lot of pasta. Great product for a very reasonable price. I love being able to break it down flat so it stores without taking up a lot of space!
customer_reviews.author: jean schaffer

customer_reviews.title: real wood
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and very satisfied .I don't want anything else .And making pasta is so much fun with this
customer_reviews.author: billyboy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, but returned it because it was a repeat, apparently Amazon does not care.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Shelley

customer_reviews.title: I don't use this as it was intended.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this for drying pasta. I use it for drying crafts after they're painted.
customer_reviews.author: SnafoooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Collapsable Pasta Drying Rack
customer_reviews.text: It works great for drying pasta. Wonderful to be able to fold and store in confined spaces. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: sadie168452

customer_reviews.title: Good Pasta Rack
customer_reviews.text: Very good pasta rack, now it I can only start making pasta, (Need My Kitchenaid)
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tedeschi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item, especially with the ravioli press and spaghetti cutters.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stegall

customer_reviews.title: ok item
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the hugest fan- I did find a dryer I liked better
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: collapsable past drying rack
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this rack folds to put it away.I used it once so far and it is very handy for drying pasta.
customer_reviews.author: k davis

customer_reviews.title: awesome pasta rack
customer_reviews.text: I love this pasta rack. I now own two of them so I can do double batches of pasta easily for the freezer. I can fit 1 pound of pasta on the rack either in the form of sheets for ravioli or spaghetti or other sized cut strands. I highly recommend it. It is inexpensive but great quality and folds up totally flat for storage. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: E Santa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This folds up into itself and is so easy to store I couldn't believe it. The pasta dried on it perfectly and uniformly too. We hung both spaghetti and also fettuccine on it and both worked great. Then just wash it off with soapy water and pop it back together and into a drawer it goes, no muss no fuss. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sandi safeer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one of these and liked it so much ordered a second one .
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it closes and stores flat taking up little space. Nice quality for a simple construction. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A requested christmas gift and my daughter loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE that it breaks down for easy storage until we are ready to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Hillier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it folds up and does not take up counter space
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: This pasta drying rack is very easy to assemble. Pasta certainly dries faster on it (compared to the one on the plate).
customer_reviews.author: Doris Ting

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: It works well, can be folded and stored when you are done and...that's perfect for our kitchen. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl J. Kochel

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic drying rack. It stores flat unlike many others out there. Easy to set up and tear down.
customer_reviews.author: C. White

customer_reviews.title: Noodle Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Received the product quickly and was packaged well. It does the job well. I am very happy with the product. It was easy to assemble and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: yogiandbooboo

customer_reviews.title: Pasta dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product! I make a lot of pasta and this simple drying rack makes me happy everytime I use it. It is made of natural products and is easy to store and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Bordenave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used this. What a difference in my pasta, given the opportunity to dry properly!
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space for my pasta recipe, easy to use, then fold up to store.
customer_reviews.author: JoAn

customer_reviews.title: pasta rack
customer_reviews.text: I started making my own past and needed a rack to let them dry, this is easy to use, easy to clean and store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: kevin mace

customer_reviews.title: Noodle Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy two as they are not big enough to hold even one recipe of homemade noodles. They fold up nicely to store easily. Sturdy when put together for drying. Just one is not very big to do anything with.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kerkau

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased at this reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Great height to hang pasta, easy to clean and folds flat for simple storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sally L Young

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about here! Works exactly as it is supposed to! Used it three times so far and the collapsable part is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the top comes off and reattaches to store the rack flat. It's also easy to hang the pasta to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Trovillion

customer_reviews.title: Bella Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted and useful for the smaller pastas that we make at home.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Fralia

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective and wood is stained, looks dirty.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in that the wooden prongs on top are either bent or the wood looks dark and stained. The rest of it looks nice, but this is a real downer. It would be nice if they would replace it with a clean perfect one.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Anna

customer_reviews.title: pasta drying rack
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this device folds up for easy storage. The 'comb' design is much easier to work with than the tree design of other products. It is well balanced and can hold a full load without tipping. Very simple. Very nice. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Arbor

customer_reviews.title: IT IS VERY HANDY
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful to use it in a small space. Now I prepare pastas oftener. My friends love homemade pastas.
customer_reviews.author: ana maria

customer_reviews.title: Easy quality
customer_reviews.text: The racks are easy to collapse & so excellent for storage in small spaces. Consistent Quality workmanship for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and take apart for storage
customer_reviews.text: This is the first drying rack that I have bought, love the ease of this rack and the quality of it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Pray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up, holds a lot of pasta, but tends to fall apart when carrying it around
customer_reviews.author: Lauri A. Thonssen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for spun sugar as well as pasta.Folds flat for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: denissa drobinski

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It won't hold much pasta and it is kind of cheap
customer_reviews.author: Sandy  Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and don't get this
customer_reviews.text: MUCH easier to just flour the pasta and leave to dry on a cookie sheet. This thing topples over and is flimsey
customer_reviews.author: DDT

customer_reviews.title: Pasta breaks as it dries...
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this rack and others, I suppose, is that as the noodles begin to dry, they break. Those that do dry on the rack break upon removal. There must be a more effective way to dry fresh made pasta.
customer_reviews.author: MTEK

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Folds up completely flat for storage. In the attached photo, I show the rack drying my batch of homemade Gluten Free Noodles. Gluten Free noodles are more crumbly than regular noodles, but, I had no problems draping them on the rack. I do have a white cutting board behind the rack to showcase the results. It is not part of the rack.
customer_reviews.author: SherryG of Tulsa

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and folds flat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful pasta rack! The wood is quality and the rack is very well made. The parts fit together perfectly, the legs rotate out smoothly, the top slips right on yet fits snugly. And as a super bonus, the box it comes in works great for storage. I can keep this in a slot beside my cutting boards. Such a good value that I may buy another just to make it easy on myself when I make pasta.
customer_reviews.author: ElleGee

customer_reviews.title: Best feature - it folds flat when not in use
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows it in use. The legs fold in and the top holder is repositioned to be flat when not in use. So it’s completely flat and can be easily stored on the counter behind the machine when not being used. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Simple Basic Pasta Rack
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to setup and easy to clean. I do wish it was a little taller as the pasta will sometimes touch the counter when hanging out to dry. We have purchased two of these since one was not enough to hold all of our pasta when we're cooking for over 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This rack is SO easy to set up and take down making storage simple. Noodles dry quicker when air is allowed to circulate around them. This provides the perfect situation for drying them.
customer_reviews.author: Caseeih

customer_reviews.title: Space saving design
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used yet but I am pleased with the product and the design. My counter space is limited and this will fit under cabinets. My old one is the tree style which takes up more space.
customer_reviews.author: LagunaLady

customer_reviews.title: Best way to dry pasta!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite way to dry pasta! Easy to store and holds enough pasta for 2 batches of my recipe. I like that the drying rods are all level , so you don’t have to cut some pasta short to fit on the drying rack.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Made in Italy...a help in our home.
customer_reviews.text: My husband makes the most delicious pasta. It has always been hard to get the noodles to dry and separate them. So...This rack is great for drying your spaghetti noodles. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: easy to store
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I expected. I know that I will need to be careful with it and clean it carefully as well. It is simple to put together and I'm looking forward to a long relationship with it and my new pasta maker.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this when I purchased my pasta machine (Fante's Great Aunt Gina's Pasta Machine). It sure beat laying out the noodles on the "floured" table (a real mess to clean up). This rack was easy to put together, take apart and repack away. It is well made, and I like the fact that it is natural beechwood - a good wood for this use and easy to clean. You can't go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The rack totally collapses flat when not it use and is compact enough to be stuffed in a cabinet without encroaching too much space. If folds and unfolds easily and is very study given it doesn't look like much right out of the package. I make all my own pasta so when my other rack did not survive a recent move I bought this one. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BrianK

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, gets out of the way
customer_reviews.text: We have a tiny kitchen, and a giant big pasta tree is out of the question. When collapsed, this item takes up no more space than a breadboard. When expanded, it's sturdy and yields an impressive amount of surface area for pasta drying. What's not to love? It's a little bit flimsy, but it's also inexpensive so I don't fault it for that. The engineering is genius and it does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Micka

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Stores easily, my only complaint would be I need more space and it’s very light so kind of tippy but it definitely does the job
customer_reviews.author: Linzy McIntyre Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cure cancer, but does allow you to dry pasta
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. It's made of wood. You hang pasta on it to dry. You remove the top piece, and reattach it horizontally to dry pasta, or vertically to store. The feet fold away flush. Simple design, no complaints. I'm taking one star off because it doesn't cure cancer. (just kidding, I have't actually tried to cure cancer with it, so I can't say for sure it doesn't). But in a kitchen filled with gleaming chrome, glass and enamel technilogical wonders, it does look a little plain.
customer_reviews.author: C. Akre

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This rack is AWESOME!! I love to make homemade pasta as it truly is easy to do, and this rack makes it even easier! Before I would just put the pasta on a cookie sheet with a lot of flour on it, and it would still stick together! This way it does not! I love that it folds up for easy storage too! I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, but it's small.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but the too-short prongs don't hold much. Probably less than a pound. Also, the wood was a bit splintered, so I had to sand it. Don't want wood in my pasta. It's cheap, though, and it breaks down easily. Wish it held more.
customer_reviews.author: Maloy

customer_reviews.title: Great drying rack for pasta
customer_reviews.text: Great pasta drying rack. Since traveling to Italy and discovering how easy it is to make your own pasta, we do it all the time. I tried other racks previous to this one and they would tip over almost immediately. This one holds as much pasta pictured, if not more, and keeps standing.
customer_reviews.author: MissD

customer_reviews.title: Pasta drying rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pasta rack. I looked at many of them and this was my choice because it takes up so little storage space when not in use. It is well made and easy to setup. I knew the shipping was going to take longer but felt it could be worth the wait. It arrived earlier then expected. I would recommend this for anyone in the market for a pasta drying rack.
customer_reviews.author: MMMso

customer_reviews.title: Well built and very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get and that is a good thing. This rack is nicely constructed and performs exactly as promised. It goes together snugly and the "feet" open outward easily. Two quick steps and your rack is ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: jem

product_meta.title: Eppicotispai EP 102 Natural Beechwood Collapsable Pasta Drying Rack
product_meta.description: Eppicotispai natural beechwood collapsible pasta drying rack, the perfect tool to dry your homemade spaghetti, tagliatelle, fettuccini, linguini and other pasta. More than 10-square feet of pasta space.
feature_bullets: Collapsable item, easy to build and easy to storage
More than 10-square feet of pasta space
Collapsable item, easy to build and easy to storage
More than 10-square feet of pasta space
